extendedInfo.description: 1. More Flexible Workout PlanningYou can now use your Android smartphone to schedule a workout for your MOTOACTV  that consists of multiple stages of the same activity type. Plan your warm up, interval, recovery, or cool down, then receive a visual and audible feedback on the device on your progress towards your targets.2. Improved Fitness ZonesView your Heart Rate, Pace, and Power zones on your Android smartphone. Specify which types of zones youâd like to use for each workout.3. Get Facebook and Twitter posts directly on your MOTOACTV.Instal Facebook and Twitter plug-ins to get wall posts and tweets directly on your MOTOACTV. Make sure that your device software has been updated to 1.7 release and that you have the latest MOTOACTV app installed on your Android smartphone.4. Weather Plug-InTo keep receiving weather updates on your MOTOACTV device, install the latest Weather plug-in after updating your MOTOACTV app.5. Performance ImprovementsEnjoy ICS enhancements and other performance improvements.Additional Information Certain features, services and applications are network dependent and may not be available in all areas; additional terms, conditions and/or charges may apply. All features, functionality and other product specifications are subject to change without notice or obligation. Contact your service provider for details.MOTOROLA and the Stylized M Logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Motorola Trademark Holdings, LLC. The Bluetooth trademarks are owned by their proprietor and used under license. Android is a trademark of Google, Inc. All other product and service names are the property of their respective owners. Â©2012 Motorola Mobility Inc. All rights reserved.

reviews.title: Uninstall
reviews.comment: If Verizon and moto after going to force this app to sit on the office then please give me the product with phone for free. Other wise, give us the option to uninstall. Most of us will never use it, even off it is great. I don\'t want it and don\'t need it. Its a waste of space on my piece.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Evil bloatware
reviews.comment: Shame on verizon for forcing this crap on to our phones. It updates all the time, and now it can read our sms and track location. Obviously, this is used for marketing purposes, not because they expect anybody to use this junk. Ignore the Motorola hacks posting positive comments
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just Not All That
reviews.comment: Bought the MotoActv today and will be returning it tomorrow. The $250 device simply doesn\'t do anything that my $3.99 phone app can\'t do. Took a total of 22 minutes to lock on gps, then lost signal 3 blocks later- failed to record the trip at all! The headphones are awful and Motocast requires a usb to transfer music to the device- FAIL! The app is okay, but the whole MotoActive system is just unimpressive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Another Bloatware app
reviews.comment: Come on, let me remove this app. I\'m not about to pay $250 for the REQUIRED device to make this app work, therefore its wasting my real estate on my phone. I must agree pre installed apps suck BAD if you cannot use or remove them. Android and Verizon GET A CLUE. Microsoft was sued for forcing Internet Explorer on they\'re os, and it won\'t be long before some one with deep pockets takes you to court over these \"BLOATWARE\'s\" you\'ve pre installed on you\'re devices. You cannot FORCE us  to use them,w/add cost.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just hide it!
reviews.comment: First is a moto app not Verizon so stop yelling at Verizon. Second of all... JUST HIDE IT! And I\'d that still isn\'t enough, tour your phone and get rid of it.  But as far as the app goes, its a good app and motoactv is an awesome product
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good for what it does.
reviews.comment: Pretty good app... needs to get better though to stay competitive with other systems.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My Tracks is better but...
reviews.comment: While my tracks is better this app isn\'t bad, but the fact that it comes pre-installed on many phones with no way to uninstall earns it 1 srar .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but Facebook error
reviews.comment: Cannot sync Facebook. I keep getting an unknown error. Formatted phone and device but the error persists.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never works, no point in having it.
reviews.comment: This app virtually never syncs with the portal or with my device. It always has some excuse for not being able to connect with the server. Doesn\'t properly connect to allow full the full phone functionality on the Motoactv. Basically, it\'s useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
reviews.comment: An amazing app to use with your motoactv! The depth that they go with features is amazing, such as the layered workout graphs and ability to see which songs were played when. Awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Grr...
reviews.comment: These apps that come with phone are manufactured on the device, which does not allow us to actually uninstall permanently per Verizon. Which blows! They need to get this taken care of so we can tale them off permanently!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Make it removable
reviews.comment: I\'m a fat out of shape trucker its useless to me. Please take it off my phone and put it in the market so the healthy people can download it. How about a cupcake app? Pizza and beer maybe?
reviews.author: warren potter

reviews.title: This is really becoming a headAce
reviews.comment: First the Facebook plug in don\'t work now the watch is not going up to my phone.  Bad bad bad Angeles I have the new note 2
reviews.author: timothy liggins

reviews.title: 2.0 update
reviews.comment: Since the release of 2.0 it crashes and doesn\'t work for crap on my RAZR Maxx. Scouring the web for the old version now to at least get the sync back.
reviews.author: William Short

reviews.title: Another app
reviews.comment: That has been preinstalled to my phone and I don\'t even use it. Wish I could delete this thing. Takes up space on my phone and I hate wasted space.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stupid people
reviews.comment: Obviously anyone that calls this \'bloatware\' is a fat and technologically challenged individual that should be using Windows Mobile. It\'s not hard to uninstall any application from any Android device. You just need to be smarter than the device.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Taking up memory and can\'t uninstall.
reviews.comment: It sounds like this is a great app for those who want it. But obviously Verizon has made a marketing deal with Moto so it comes on the phone and cannot be uninstalled. This is taking up memory that i can\'t use for apps i DO want. Therefore I give it a low rating so Moto will be motivated to change the deal. I am not stupid; this app is set up on my phone so you cannot uninstall it. Moto this is a bad idea!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad facebook posting
reviews.comment: Please improve the caption and thumbnail of facebook post. It impresses no one now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inaccurate and Waste
reviews.comment: Please don\'t give us devices with worthless apps pre-installed on them. This is inaccurate and is not very useful. Uninstalling now.
reviews.author: Zachary Desai

reviews.title: Verizon, you suck.
reviews.comment: I hate your stupid apps that you constantly put on OUR phone s, that you don\'t let us uninstall, and on top of that, they are the worst apps around.
reviews.author: A Google User
